data.text: ◄Yahweh is pleased with/Happy are► those about whom no one can say truthfully that they have done things that are wrong,
Yahweh is pleased with those who ◄obey his requirements/do what he has instructed them to do►,
They do not do things that are wrong;
Yahweh, you have given us ◄your principles of behavior/all the things that you have declared that we should do►,
I desire that I will faithfully/always obey all ◄your statutes/that you have said that we should do►.
If I continually ◄heed/pay attention to► all ◄your commands/that you have commanded►,
When I learn all of ◄your regulations/the rules that you have given to us►,
I will obey all ◄your statutes/that you have decreed that we should do►;
I know [RHQ] how a youth can ◄keep his life pure/avoid sinning►;
I try to serve you with my entire inner being;
I have ◄memorized/stored in my mind► many of ◄your words/what you have promised►
Yahweh, I praise you;
I [MTY] tell others ◄the regulations/the rules that you have given to us►.
I like to obey ◄your requirements/what you have instructed us to do►;
I will ◄study/think about► ◄your principles of behavior/what you have declared that we should do►,
I will be happy to obey ◄your statutes/what you have decreed that we should do►,
Do good things for me, who serve you,
Open my mind
I am living here on the earth for only a short time;
In my inner being I strongly desire to know ◄your regulations/the rules that you have given to us► all the time.
You rebuke those who are proud;
Do not allow them to continue to insult and scorn me;
Rulers gather together and plan ways to harm me,
I am delighted with ◄your requirements/what you have instructed us to do►;
I think that I will soon die [IDM];
When I told you about my behavior, you answered me;
Help me to understand ◄your principles of behavior/what you have declared that we should do►,
I am very sad/sorrowful [IDM], with the result that I have no strength;
Prevent me from doing what is wrong,
I have decided that I will faithfully/always obey you;
Yahweh, I try to carefully hold fast to what you have instructed us to do;
I will eagerly obey [IDM] ◄your commands/what you have commanded►,
Yahweh, teach me the meaning of ◄your statutes/the things that you have decreed that we should do►,
Help me to understand your laws
I am happy with ◄your commands/what you have commanded►,
Cause me to want to obey your rules
Do not allow me to look at things that are worthless,
Because I serve you, do what you promised to do for me,
People insult me;
I very much desire to obey ◄your principles of behavior/what you have declared that we should do►;
Yahweh, show me that you faithfully love me,
After you do that, I will be able to reply to those who insult me,
Always enable me to [LIT] speak your truth,
I will always obey your laws,
I will be free from ◄affliction/my enemies’ attacks►,
I will tell to kings ◄your requirements/what you have instructed us to do►;
I am delighted to obey ◄your commands/what you have commanded►,
I respect/revere [IDM] ◄your commands/what you have commanded►,
Do not forget what you said/promised to do for me, who serve you,
When I have been suffering, you comforted me;
Proud people are always making fun of me,
Yahweh, when I think about ◄your regulations/the rules► that you gave to us long ago,
When I see that wicked people have disregarded your laws,
While I have been living here for a short time on the earth,
Yahweh, during the night I think about you [MTY],
What I have always done is to obey ◄your principles of behavior/what you have declared that we should do►.
Yahweh, you are the one whom I have chosen,
With all my inner being I plead with you to be good to me;
I have thought about my behavior,
I hurry to obey ◄your commands/what you have commanded►;
Wicked people have tried to seize me, like a hunter tries to catch an animal with a net [MET],
In the middle of the night I wake up,
I am a friend of all those who revere you,
Yahweh, you faithfully/always love people all over the earth;
Yahweh, you have done good things for me,
Teach me to think carefully before I decide what to do,
Before you afflicted/punished me, I did things that were wrong,
You are very good, and what you do is good;
Proud people have told many lies about me,
Those proud people ◄are stupid/do not understand your laws► [IDM],
It was good for me that you afflicted/punished me,
The laws that you [MTY] gave/told to us are worth more to me than gold,
You created me and formed my body (OR, kept me safe);
Those who have an awesome respect for you will see what you have done for me, and they will rejoice,
Yahweh, I know that ◄your regulations/the rules that you have given to us► are right/fair
Cause me to be comforted/encouraged by knowing that you faithfully love me,
Be merciful to me in order that I may continue to live,
Cause the proud people who falsely accuse me to be ashamed,
Cause those who revere you to come back to me
Enable me to perfectly obey ◄your statutes/what you have decreed that we should do►
I am very tired/exhausted while I wait for you to save me from my enemies;
My eyes are tired from waiting a long time for you to do what you promised/said that you would do,
I have become as useless as [MET] a wineskin that is shriveled from hanging a long time in the smoke inside a house,
How long must I wait?
It is as though proud people have dug deep pits for me to fall into,
All ◄your commands are/what you have commanded is► trustworthy;
Those people have almost killed me,
Because you faithfully love me, allow me to continue to live
Yahweh, your words will last forever;
You will faithfully continue doing ◄for people who are not yet born/in every generation► what you have ◄promised/said that you would do►;
To this day, all things on the earth remain because you decided that they should remain;
If I had not been delighted in obeying your laws,
I will never forget ◄your principles of behavior/what you have declared that we should do►,
I belong to you; save/rescue me from my enemies,
Wicked men are waiting to kill me,
I have learned that there is a limit/end for everything,
I love your laws very much.
Because I know ◄your commands/what you have commanded►,
I understand more than my teachers do,
I understand more than many old people do,
I have avoided all evil behavior
I have not ◄turned away from/quit► obeying ◄your regulations/the rules that you have given to us►,
When I read your words,
Because I have learned ◄your principles of behavior/what you have declared that we should do►,
Your words are like [MET] a lamp to guide me;
I have solemnly promised, and I am solemnly promising it again,
Yahweh, I am suffering very much;
Yahweh, when I thank you while I pray, it is like [MET] a sacrifice to you;
My enemies are often trying to kill me [IDM],
Wicked people have tried to seize me like a hunter tries to catch an animal with a trap [MET],
◄Your requirements/What you have instructed us to do► are my possession forever;
I ◄have decided/am determined► [IDM] to obey ◄your statutes/what you have decreed that we should do► until the day that I die [MTY].
I hate people who are only partly committed to you,
You are like a place where I can hide from my enemies,
You evil people, stay away from me
Enable me to be strong, as you promised/said that you would do,
Hold me up, in order that I will be safe
You reject all those who disobey ◄your statutes/what you have decreed that we should do►;
You get rid of all the wicked people on the earth like [SIM] people throw away trash;
I [SYN] tremble because I am afraid of you;
But I have done what is right and fair/just;
Promise me that you will do good things for me
My eyes are tired from waiting a long time for you to rescue me,
Do something for me to show that you faithfully love me,
I am one who serves you;
Yahweh, now is the time for you to punish people
Truly, I love ◄your commands/what you have commanded► more than I love gold;
So I conduct my life by ◄your principles of behavior/what you have declared that we should do►,
◄Your requirements are/All the things that you have instructed us to do are► wonderful,
When someone explains ◄your words/what you have said►,
I eagerly desire to know ◄your commands/what you have commanded►,
Listen to me and act kindly to me,
Guide me as you promised/said that you would do and help me not to fall/sin;
Rescue/Save me from those who oppress me
Be kind to me
I cry very much
Yahweh, you are righteous
◄Your requirements/All the things that you have instructed us to do► are true
I am ◄furious/very angry►
◄Your promises are/All the things that you have said that you will do are► dependable
I am not important and people despise me,
You are righteous and you will be righteous forever,
I constantly have troubles/difficulties and I am worried,
◄Your requirements are/All the things that you have instructed us to do are► always fair;
Yahweh, with all my inner being I call out to you;
I call out to you;
Each morning I arise before dawn and call to you to help me;
All during the night I am awake,
Yahweh, because you faithfully love me,
Those evil people who oppress/persecute me are coming closer to me;
But Yahweh, you are near to me,
Long ago I found out about ◄your requirements/all the things that you have instructed us to do►,
Look at me and see that I am suffering very much, and heal me,
Defend me when others accuse me, and rescue me from them;
Wicked people do not obey ◄your statutes/what you have decreed that we should do►,
Yahweh, you are very merciful;
Many people are my enemies and many people ◄cause me to suffer/persecute me►,
When I look at those who are not faithful to you, I am disgusted
Yahweh, notice that I love ◄your principles of behavior/what you have declared that we should do►;
All that you have said is truth,
Rulers persecute me for no reason,
I am happy about ◄your words/what you have promised to do for me►,
I thoroughly hate [DOU] all lies
Seven/Many times each day I thank you for ◄your regulations/the rules that you have given to us►,
Things go well for those who love your laws;
Yahweh, I confidently expect that you will rescue me from my troubles,
I obey ◄what you require/what you have instructed► us to do;
I obey ◄your principles of behavior/what you have declared that we should do►,
Yahweh, listen while I pray for you to help me;
Hear me while I pray
I [MTY] will always praise you
I will sing about ◄your words/what you have promised to do►
I ask you [SYN] to always be ready to help me
Yahweh, I eagerly desire for you to rescue/save me from my enemies;
Allow me to continue to live in order that I can continue to praise you,
I have wandered away from you like [SIM] a sheep that has become lost;
